name: Blue Hippo MkII
details:
Analog ChorusThe Blue Hippo Analog Chorus returns with its famously diverse range of luscious, liquefied tones-and then some! The MkII retains the MkI's easy-to-to use control setup, which takes you from lush tone-widening to full-on rotating speaker modulation madness from the depths of the Marianas Trench. But now, there's a Vibe switch for adding some thick vibrato goodness to your aqueous tones. Don't wade into the water without your Blue Hippo Analog Chorus MkII! 
https://www.jimdunlop.com/product/whe601-7-10137-08578-7.do
